text: [Ej mu'minon] Be tardid, kasone, ki on tuhmati ʙuzurgro [dar ʙorai Oisa] matrah kardand, guruhe az xudi sumo hastand. Gumon nakuned, ki in [mocaro] ʙaroi sumo sarr ast, ʙalki xajre ʙarojaton dar on [nuhufta] ast. Baroi har jak az onon [ki dar in soeaparokani naqs dostaand] kajfari gunohest, ki murtakiʙ sudaast va ʙaroi on kase az eson, ki ʙaxsi ʙuzurgi on [tuhmat]-ro ʙa uhda dorad, azoʙi ʙuzurge [dar pes] ast
